title: Iran: Execution of two juvenile offenders makes mockery of Iran’s ‘justice’ (Amnesty International Australia)
text: ( Source : Amnesty International Australia ) Reports have emerged of a second execution of a juvenile offender in Iran in just a few days Amnesty International said today, which reveal the full horror of the country's deeply flawed juvenile
